name: Glitter Slut
caption: This is truly one of my most-prized possessions. I don't know what it is, it's just so perfect. I got this walking over a bridge leading away from a festival; there were essentially only two ways to leave, so it was just a mile-long stream of people. Some girl had speakers out and was playing more music. I talked to her for a few minutes and she traded me this.

name: Rave Mom & Dad
caption: These two are from a friend; they were a gift for my partner and me. I don't necessarily love it being gendered, but it's still super sweet and we both wear them to festivals.

name: From an Ex-Friend
caption: Bracelet from someone I used to be friends with. I don't really wear it anymore but I don't like getting rid of these kinds of things.

name: From My Bestie
caption: A handful of bracelets from one of my best friends. She and her partner have traded *bunch* of kandi with me over the years. She's actually the person who got me into the entire EDM scene. I gotta get some pictures of the bigger pieces they've given me ðŸ¥¹.

name: Rave Fam
caption: The only one on this list that *I* made; one of a set of 4 matching bracelets for myself, my partner, my best friend, and her partner. Each of us has the wristband in their favorite color, and then a single bead for each of the other 3. I even made sure it's in the same order on all 4, so each one has the full information needed to recreate the other 3 exactly.

name: Star From a Random Nice Person :)
caption: Someone ran up to me at a music festival to tell me she liked my makeup ðŸ¥º. I we traded kandi and I gave her a hug; I love this community so much.

name: Water Tribe Bracelet from a "Fan"
caption: At the same festival that I got the star bracelet, someone stood over me and my partner for a bit fanning us and we traded. I tried to ask them which of mine they wanted but they told me it doesn't work that way, I had to pick one for them. I ended up giving them a Madeon bracelet and they gave me this. It's so damn pretty, I love it so much.

name: Forgotten Ones
caption: These are kind of the reason I felt motivated to make this catalogue. I only vaguely remember who I got these from and where it was. I really want to make sure I don't forget any more.
